column1: Customisation on Wpamelia Plugin for Online Appointments
column3: I am currently using an appointment booking plugin from https://wpamelia.com/ on my WordPress Website and in need of several customizations to suit booking for healthcare services.   Customisation required:  Feature 1: Currently, the custom fields are restricted to only one main person's details. I would like to be able to add more sections that could "Add More Customer" along with their details (6-10 fields per customer) for Group Bookings and be able to access the details from the backend panel.   Feature 2:  Able to close certain timeslots from the backend panel. I have bookings that come from offline and would need to close online appointment slots when the session is full. There is no feature for this at the moment on WP Amelia as of now.Categoría: Programación y TecnologíaSubcategoría: Wordpress¿Cuál es el alcance del proyecto?: Desarrollo de sitio personalizado¿Es un proyecto o una posición?: Un proyectoActualmente tengo: Tengo las especificacionesDisponibilidad requerida: Según se necesite

column1: Comparison prices page for different stores
column3: Need to create a comparison page that allows stores (Auto Parts and Services) have an inventory of their different articles and services, where thirds users can search for pieces from different stores using filters, comparing prices and distance where the store is located. Show images of products, Address, phone number this reinforces what the customer is buying.  (The filters and how the different inventories are updated is the most sensitive part)   It is a typical platform that contains a catalog of services that guide users according to what they are looking for.  Stores that are interested in selling their products on the platform must be registered, this registration must be approved by the platform administration,  and then stores can upload their inventories, photos and respective prices through an authorized user with ID and password.  (I posted this project before but have some trouble and the person who administered the requirements on this website retired so couldn’t develop it, now I am looking for someone who understands what I need and can develop it at a reasonable cost) I have some example page and documents support, if you are interested show me your experience, works developed and strategy to use in our project. The team will be evaluating carefully your offer.   Language: English and SpanishCategoría: Programación y TecnologíaSubcategoría: Programación Web¿Cuál es el alcance del proyecto?: Crear un nuevo sitio personalizado¿Es un proyecto o una posición?: Un proyectoActualmente tengo: Tengo las especificacionesDisponibilidad requerida: Según se necesiteIntegraciones de API: Social media (Facebook, Twitter, etc.), Otros (Otras APIs), Cloud Storage (Dropbox, Google Drive, etc.)Roles necesarios: Diseñador, Programador, Diseñar una landing page, Analista funcional

column1: Help with Wordpress - Customers not able to select more than 2 choi...
column3: Hello, I sell chocolates on my website. We offer different size of boxes and different flavors. Customers can select a certain number of flavors based on the size of the box. However, since Thursday, there has been an issue that is not allowing the customer to select more than 2 flavors regardless of the size of the gift box.  I have already updated all Plugins but it did not resolve the issue. column1: Design Wordpress page and menus for online course
column3: Hi.  I need to design a web page for an online course.  The web is in Wordpress and has the Enfold theme installed, which is very versatile.  You only need to make a single template page. It is not required to do the whole web, only the template page.  The design must be as similar as possible to the attached image:  - Side menu that shows by default only the mother pages (pages), the children (subpages) will be seen only when clicking.  - The side menu will be fixed, it will not scroll when scrolling on the screen. Only the content will scroll. If the menu options are too many to appear with the fixed menu, the menu will scroll, but independent of the content section. As seen in the attached image.  - Although it is not necessary for the design to be exactly like the image, it must be clear and clean. I have tried with Wordpress menu plugins and they are not clear and with good design.  - It must be responsive, and the menu must work on tablets and mobiles  Thank you.Categoría: Programación y TecnologíaSubcategoría: Wordpress¿Cuál es el alcance del proyecto?: Desarrollo de sitio personalizado¿Es un proyecto o una posición?: Un proyectoActualmente tengo: Tengo las especificacionesDisponibilidad requerida: Según se necesite

column1: Design a website for a caregiving training company
column3: I need a website for my company that provides training for caregivers for the elderly. We also deploy the caregivers that we have trained to clients who need our service. The training will be in a workshop format for beginner level and advance level. The website should contain the following: a.) A brief history of the company b.) The team members and their backgrounds c.) Our affiliations with our corporate and government partners d.) Our training content and pricing e.) Pictures of our training session. We need you to find non copyright restriction pictures as we will be having our first training only in February 2021 f.) Methods on how clients can reach to us if they need caregivers that we have trained g.) Other trainings that we are providing such as English, French, Tamil, Korean, Japanese, Mandarin and Arabian Language for caregivers that are preparing to go abroad to work.  I need the website to be ready by end of January 2021. I am targeting this training for Malaysians and foreign nationals who are in Malaysia.Categoría: Programación y TecnologíaSubcategoría: Diseño Web¿Cuál es el alcance del proyecto?: Crear un nuevo diseño personalizado¿Es un proyecto o una posición?: Un proyectoActualmente tengo: Tengo una ideaDisponibilidad requerida: Según se necesiteIntegraciones de API: Social media (Facebook, Twitter, etc.), Payment Processor (Paypal, Stripe, etc.)Necesidad específica: Crear un sitio WordPress

We’re looking for a Full Stack developer who will take a key role on our team. Our Full Stack developer must have knowledge in all stages of software development.   You’ll be working alongside other engineers and developers, collaborating on the various layers of the infrastructure for our App/Web.  Responsibilities:  - Develop visually appealing front end App/website architecture, including translating designer mock-ups and wireframes into front-end code - Develop functional databases, applications, and servers to support websites on the back end - Ensure cross-platform optimization for mobile - Develop and design RESTful services and APIs - Strategize organizational direction on emerging technology platforms and communicate the effectiveness to executive stakeholders - Ensure that non-functional requirements such as security, performance, maintainability, scalability, usability, and reliability are being considered when architecting solutions.  Skills:  - Fluent with Flutter - Fluent in CSS (Foundation or Bootstrap), JavaScript, and HTML - Strong knowledge of Linux, PHP, and MySQL, with working understanding of MongoDB, PostgreSQL, AngularJS, Express.js, Oracle, React, Ember and Node.js. - Experience working with languages such as Java, .Net, Python, PHP or Ruby. - Experience in API design and development.  - Understanding of libraries including Backbone.js and jQuery. - Experience with AJAX. - Experience working with server technologies including Apache, ISS, Node.js, Nginx, and J2EE.  - Strong knowledge of data structures, system design, and algorithmsCategoría: Programación y TecnologíaSubcategoría: Programación de Apps. I need the win32 / 64 desktop application that will emulate user activity for one of the online bidding brazillian services.  The application must:  - creating human-like delays;  - process errors, do not repeat actions in unexpected responses from the server;  - use the fully functional Chrome or Firefox browser window;  - follow strict rules:  Bid with varying time periods and re-bid if a user submits a later bid  You will receive the site name to bid as soon as you request more information.  Specify something like "law all to the end" at the beginning of the message to ensure that you are human and really want to win the project.Categoría: Programación y TecnologíaSubcategoría: OtrosTamaño del proyecto: Pequeño¿Es un proyecto o una posición?: Un proyectoActualmente tengo: Tengo una ideaDisponibilidad requerida: Según se necesite

column1: Create an app for a sustainable development company
column3: I need an app that works both for Android and iOS. This app should enable end users to log in via phone or email using two-factor authentication. The app shall enable end users to earn tokens they can convert into cash or purchase VDR services. The app should display a 'VDR Token' earnings based on (a) renewable energy used, (b) waste recycled/upcycled, (c) trees planted, and (d) distance travelled via walking, bicycle, and/or e-vehicle.Categoría: Programación y TecnologíaSubcategoría: Programación de Apps. Android, iOS y otros¿Cuál es el alcance del proyecto?: Crear una aplicación nueva¿Es un proyecto o una posición?: Un proyectoActualmente tengo: Tengo una ideaDisponibilidad requerida: Según se necesitePlataformas requeridas: Android, iPhoneNecesito: Crear una appTipo de app: Utilidad - Aplicación de utilidad (flash, calculadora, etc.)Apps similares: UberNecesita backend: NoProcesador de pago: Sí

You are passionate about translating a proven user-experience journey into a smooth and intuitive interface. Ideally, you’re also experienced with charting libraries.  *Required Technical Expertise* -Expertise programming in HTML and knowledge in CSS3+ and JavaScript -Experience with frameworks such as Vue (preferably) or React -Experience with JavaScript-based charting libraries, like Chart.js -Cross-browser and mobile responsive development -Ability to work successfully in a team, and take initiatives on tasks -Good understanding of software development processes like Scrum and Agile  *Existing UI design and formatted data* The successful candidate will work off a finalised UI design and charts in Sketch, with the full navigation on Invision, as well as fully-formatted data.  *About US* We are the data analytics platform for the impact sector. It automates the analysis and visualisation of impact data and presents social and environmental performance based on any given impact measurement framework.  *Beyond this project* The candidate will have the opportunity to work with us, beyond the Vodafone Foundation project, to shape a user-centric application, based on a wealth of data, fed through automated data structures.  *Please get in touch*Categoría: Programación y TecnologíaSubcategoría: Programación Web¿Cuál es el alcance del proyecto?: Crear un nuevo sitio personalizado¿Es un proyecto o una posición?: Un proyectoActualmente tengo: Tengo las especificacionesDisponibilidad requerida: Según se necesiteIntegraciones de API: Cloud Storage (Dropbox, Google Drive, etc.)Roles necesarios: Programador, Diseñador
